segments.text: Peeking into this scene, I see the everyday kitchen life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are ajar with cookies inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on tiptoes on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation is sweet in a sneaky way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the real issue is the flooding sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes away, utterly unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral face shows total focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens toward the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a big fall soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting and safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel anxious watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR
